subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Stefan Matteau, the son of the player who scored one of the most memorable goals in the history of the New York Rangers, is expected to be selected in the first round of the N.H.L. draft.
snippet: Stefan Matteau, the son of the player who scored one of the most memorable goals in the history of the New York Rangers, is expected to be selected in the first round of the N.H.L. draft.
